title: 113. Your Worthiness and Your Boundaries
itunes:title: Your Worthiness and Your Boundaries
description:
In this episode of The Self Love Fix Podcast, I’m talking all about the importance of containing boundaries and worthiness in different aspects of life. I hope that these points will help you realize your worth regardless of what others may think about you or your boundaries. So be sure to listen to the full episode for all the details! 

Here are a few points I cover: 

  • The role your boundaries play with job opportunities.
  • Boundaries in relationships.
  • Worthiness doesn’t have to be compromised in setting our boundaries.
  • Remember, you’re in control.

I hope by hearing these tips, it’ll help you keep your boundaries especially in the most important areas of your life. Remember that you make the rules in your life and you don’t need to feel ashamed even if you feel uncertain. 

If you liked this episode of the podcast, take a screenshot, head on over to my Instagram and share it on your IG stories and tag me, @theselflovefix

If you love what you learned, be sure to hit that follow button so you never miss a future episode, and make sure to leave a review to help me reach more listeners just like you looking to follow their inner truth and live a life of abundance & authentic self-love.

Make sure you pre-enroll for the Self Love Fix Collective membership! You can check out the Pay in Full Plan here and the Payment Plan here.
